content.text:
News

11 September 2023

Ten dedicated members of the Interhome Group from six different countries embarked on a train journey to Klagenfurt, Austria. Their mission was to deepen their understanding of biodiversity and to engage in voluntary work.

As part of our week of biodiversity and sustainability education in Carinthia, we visited the Hribar family in the mountains above the Trögener Kamm to learn about establishing permaculture gardens. We prepared the ground and laid the foundation for planting new flora in spring 2024.

The next day, we hiked up the mountain to plant 50 saplings. We chose five assorted species to create a diverse and climate-resistant woodland. Additionally, we erected a fence to shield them from deer and stag intrusions. Although the challenging terrain left us sweating, we appreciated our triumphs and looked forward to their imminent growth.

Our time in Carinthia was an inspiring week of biodiversity and sustainability education. Ten more colleagues will join us in spreading the message of sustainability within Interhome Group after this trip, with the hope that many more will follow.

We also had the opportunity to visit our bee project during the trip. You can read more about it here: Save the bee – save our earth! | Interhome

content.textLeft:
20th-21st June 2023: Interhome Group Volunteers help out at Parc Natural dels Aiguamolls de l'Empordà in Spain

At Interhome Group, we recently organized a volunteering initiative where our dedicated staff members spent two days in the Parc Natural dels Aiguamolls de l'Empordà, Spain. This outstanding park holds the distinction of being the second largest wetland in Catalonia and is widely acclaimed as one of the Mediterranean region's premier nature reserves, boasting a remarkable array of flora and fauna.

The Parc Natural dels Aiguamolls de l'Empordà is known for its wetlands, thriving with otters, white storks, and Camargue horses. It attracts migratory birds, making it a haven for birdwatchers. The park offers hiking and biking trails, as well as bird platforms for observing its diverse avian population.

content.text:
During our volunteering activities, we took on meaningful projects to support the park's facilities. We constructed a shelter with tables and benches, designed to accommodate children's programs, and we also painted the tables to ensure their durability in the park's environment. Additionally, we dedicated our efforts to clearing a 2-kilometre hiking and biking trail, removing weeds, non-native plants, and thorny branches that obstructed the path. These tasks allowed us to actively contribute to the park's maintenance and conservation efforts. Alongside our volunteer work, we had the opportunity to participate in an informative park tour, which deepened our understanding of its ecological significance.

We extend our heartfelt gratitude to the park's skilled staff members, namely Glòria, Sònia, and Aleix, whose invaluable support and collaboration played an integral role in our volunteering endeavor. Our commitment to environmental conservation and protection remains unwavering, and we eagerly anticipate returning to the Parc Natural dels Aiguamolls de l'Empordà in the future, as well as exploring other exceptional parks.

Given the park's close proximity to our local service offices in Empuriabrava and Roses, we are delighted to inform our clients about the extraordinary opportunity to immerse themselves in the splendor of nature at this remarkable location. At Interhome Group, we believe in fostering sustainable experiences and are dedicated to sharing this outstanding natural gem with our clients.
>> Learn more about other sustainability projects supported by the Interhome Group

elements.title: A memorable holiday experience
elements.subtitle: Privacy and freedom in your own holiday home
elements.caption: Be your own boss, eat whenever you want and make the most of plenty of space for all your friends and family.

elements.title: Why choose Interhome?
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than doing it than in a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, experience the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or indulge yourself in the luxury of a Spanish Villa. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online with us - it is quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your own holiday home
elements.caption: A stay in a holiday house or apartment offers so many advantages: spend your time exactly the way you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules and pace. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Kick back and enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your own holiday letting.
